ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson battles a possessed guy claiming to be Gargarax, then her intuition leads her to the wife of the man who conjured Gargarax up.
Blue thinks he is hallucinating when he hears repeats on the news.
Rooster Cogburn wipes out the Capon Mob.
Rover Johnson gets beaten up because people think they heard that he might have done something.
In a post-apocalyptic world, a bunch of starving humans come across aliens raised on old TV signals.
Micky Swift finds himself 1000 years in the future in Ether City.
